chapter.text: Starting off,^500 you seemed very curious about,^500 well,^500 you. ^1500Why you? ^1500How did I get to you? ^1500What am I doing with you? ^1500To that, I have to say that you are the only ones that can preserve. ^1500You are special from the countless ones I’ve tried to use before, and you’re the only one I’ve been able to establish this kind of connection with. ^1500I wasn’t expecting you,^500 in all honesty. ^1500I thought you’d be another set to use,^500 but you turned out to be so much more.
